San_Bernardino.Bunker Hill (San Bernardino, California): Bunker Hill is a bluff in the City of San Bernardino in San Bernardino County, California. Bunker Hill trends northwest-southeast from 34°05′19″N 117°18′18″W through the campus of San Bernardino Valley College on the northeast to 34°04′46″N 117°18′6″W where it overlooks Lytle Creek on the southeast. Its tallest point is over 1080 feet at the top of a ridge marking its southwest facing edge at 34°05′04″N 117°18′33″W the top of a ridge, just south of Grant Avenue, that overlooks the southern parking lot of the college.
